description: This lightly spiced curried rice salad is a quick, easy and filling lunch.
name: Curried Rice Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Tip the rice and onion mix into a large bowl and stir in the carrots, sultanas, chopped coriander, lemon juice, lemon zest and flaked almonds. Serve warm or cold.
Tip the rice and onion mix into a large bowl and stir in the carrots, sultanas, chopped coriander, lemon juice, lemon zest and flaked almonds. Serve warm or cold.
